ItemTooltips.force_staff: Great for escape due to your low walk speed. This is also great for saving others as well as forcing the enemy forward unexpectedly for a gank!
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: This makes your Chain Frost OP
ItemTooltips.tranquil_boots: As Kel'thuzad has sacrafice for mana, health boots are best.

AbilityTooltips.lich_frost_nova: The reason we put a point into frost blast before sacrafice is because there are always scenarios where you could need a quick nuke to turn around an early gank.
AbilityTooltips.lich_dark_ritual: This will keep your mana up. Keep up the harassment in the lane to control it,
AbilityTooltips.lich_chain_frost: This Ulty is devestating and turns around battles when enamies are grouped up.
